Dependency
==========


Pytonik is built on python and requires the support of other modules to enhance application development without these, dependency functions like database connections, imaging properties wonâ€™t work.
Below are lists of dependencies:

**MYSQL**
If your web application supports MySQL database this module is required and needed to be installed using
``pip install mysql-connector``.

**POSTGRESQL**
If your web application supports PostgreSQL database this module is required and needed to be installed using
``pip install psycopg2``.

**ORACLE**


If your web application supports ORACLE database this module is required and needed to be installed using
``pip install cx-Oracle``.

**PILLOW**

If your web application supports imaging, resize and other imaging functions this module is required and needed to be installed using
``pip install Pillow``.
